channel.title: Comments on: An extraordinary evening
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: That's really fantastic!!! I see the hands of fate there, definitely. I am crossing my fingers for you (well, technically I'm typing, but you know what I mean)
item.content:encoded: That’s really fantastic!!! I see the hands of fate there, definitely. I am crossing my fingers for you (well, technically I’m typing, but you know what I mean)
